Description: Glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig(damaged), a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the leg section is inscribed with four rows of incised illegible hieroglyphs, possibly modern; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Condition: poor - cracked around knees, head damaged
